name: Twilio ASR Demo
description: A demo showing Twilio ASR on a phone call

TWILIO_API_KEY_SID.description: API Keys are revokable credentials for the Twilio API. You can create it here: https://www.twilio.com/console/dev-tools/api-keys

TWILIO_API_KEY_SECRET.description: API Keys are revokable credentials for the Twilio API.

TWILIO_SYNC_SERVICE_SID.description: A Sync service to synchronice the speech-to-text result in real-time to the browser

TWILIO_PHONE_NUMBER.description: A Twilio phone number uses for the outbound call.
